Ctrl K

Search...

Navigation

Contacts

Update Contact

PUT

/

api

/

v1

/

accounts

/

{account\_id}

/

contacts

/

{id}

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request PUT \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/contacts/{id} \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>' \
  --data '{
  "name": "Alice",
  "email": "alice@acme.inc",
  "blocked": false,
  "phone_number": "+123456789",
  "avatar_url": "https://example.com/avatar.png",
  "identifier": "1234567890",
  "additional_attributes": {
    "type": "customer",
    "age": 30
  },
  "custom_attributes": {}
}'
```

204

403

404

Copy

```
{
  "id": 123,
  "payload": [\
    {\
      "additional_attributes": {},\
      "availability_status": "<string>",\
      "email": "<string>",\
      "id": 123,\
      "name": "<string>",\
      "phone_number": "<string>",\
      "blocked": true,\
      "identifier": "<string>",\
      "thumbnail": "<string>",\
      "custom_attributes": {\
        "attribute_key": "attribute_value",\
        "signed_up_at": "dd/mm/yyyy"\
      },\
      "last_activity_at": 123,\
      "created_at": 123,\
      "contact_inboxes": [\
        {\
          "source_id": "<string>",\
          "inbox": {\
            "id": 123,\
            "avatar_url": "<string>",\
            "channel_id": 123,\
            "name": "<string>",\
            "channel_type": "<string>",\
            "provider": "<string>"\
          }\
        }\
      ]\
    }\
  ]
}
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#parameter-id)

id

number

required

ID of the contact

#### Body

application/json

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#body-name)

name

string

name of the contact

Example:

`"Alice"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#body-email)

email

string

email of the contact

Example:

`"alice@acme.inc"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#body-blocked)

blocked

boolean

whether the contact is blocked or not

Example:

`false`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#body-phone-number)

phone\_number

string

phone number of the contact

Example:

`"+123456789"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#body-avatar)

avatar

file

Send the form data with the avatar image binary or use the avatar\_url

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#body-avatar-url)

avatar\_url

string

The url to a jpeg, png file for the contact avatar

Example:

`"https://example.com/avatar.png"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#body-identifier)

identifier

string

A unique identifier for the contact in external system

Example:

`"1234567890"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#body-additional-attributes)

additional\_attributes

object

An object where you can store additional attributes for contact. example {"type":"customer", "age":30}

Example:

```
{ "type": "customer", "age": 30 }
```

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#body-custom-attributes)

custom\_attributes

object

An object where you can store custom attributes for contact. example {"type":"customer", "age":30}, this should have a valid custom attribute definition.

Example:

```
{}
```

#### Response

204

204403404

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-id)

id

number

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-payload)

payload

object\[\]

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-additional-attributes)

additional\_attributes

object

The object containing additional attributes related to the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-availability-status)

availability\_status

string

The availability status of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-email)

email

string

The email address of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-id)

id

integer

The ID of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-name)

name

string

The name of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-phone-number)

phone\_number

string

The phone number of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-blocked)

blocked

boolean

Whether the contact is blocked

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-identifier)

identifier

string

The identifier of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-thumbnail)

thumbnail

string

The thumbnail of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-custom-attributes)

custom\_attributes

object

The custom attributes of the contact

Example:

```
{
  "attribute_key": "attribute_value",
  "signed_up_at": "dd/mm/yyyy"
}
```

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-last-activity-at)

last\_activity\_at

integer

The last activity at of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-created-at)

created\_at

integer

The created at of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-contact-inboxes)

contact\_inboxes

object\[\]

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-source-id)

source\_id

string

Contact Inbox Source Id

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-inbox)

inbox

object

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-inbox-id)

inbox.id

number

ID of the inbox

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-inbox-avatar-url)

inbox.avatar\_url

string

The avatar image of the inbox

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-inbox-channel-id)

inbox.channel\_id

number

The ID of the channel

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-inbox-name)

inbox.name

string

The name of the inbox

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-inbox-channel-type)

inbox.channel\_type

string

The type of the inbox

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/update-contact#response-inbox-provider)

inbox.provider

string

The provider of the inbox
